1. ETQ Portal > eRequests.
2. Warehouse Requests > Sure Ship Domestic.
3. Enter SO # and select Host: AC Prod.
Rationale: Use for Reno [VXX] if Delivery hasn't moved in 2 days.

Instructions:
1. ETQ Portal > Warehouse Requests.
2. Select 'Sure Ship International'.
3. Provide Export details.
Rationale: For global shipments delayed in warehouse processing.

Instructions:
1. ETQ > Warehouse Requests > Receiving Expedite.
2. Enter PO/Carrier/Tracking info.
Rationale: Use if items show 'Delivered' but are not 'Received' after 3 days.
For HK items stuck in 'Awaiting Receipt' status.
Include PO# and DID in subject line.

Instructions:
1. Check Unity Leg1 for tracking.
2. If tracking exists: Cancellation not possible.
3. If no tracking: Open Salesforce case.
Rationale: Always verify tracking before attempting to cancel.
Direct links for Reno warehouse requests.

Instructions:
1. Check Unity 'Alerts' tab.
2. If PO is 'Awaiting Receipt' > Check Leg 1 tracking.
3. If no tracking > Contact Vendor.
Rationale: Reduces redundant tasks to the purchasing team.
